## Source: ossf-package-analysis (25f0aee1e117152ac6f4bf01df0fc766d85a482953feea9fdece74e016a3cc65)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'decoupled-local-node-rig' @ 9.1.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
